description:
ON SALE FOR A VERY LIMITED TIME.
BUY NOW BEFORE THE PRICE GOES UP!

Have you ever wanted or needed to communicate with someone who didn't speak your language?

Vocre is a fun and easy way to have a conversation with someone who speaks a different language. 

Vocre's unique table-top interface is great for when you're sitting at a table, possibly over lunch & ready to have a more lengthy conversation. 

Today's world is more connected than ever before; however, language still divides us. Vocre breaks down the language barrier, and brings us all closer - no matter where we are or what language we speak. 

Vocre is your perfect travel companion, and works quickly, allowing you to understand -- and be understood -- almost anywhere on Earth. 

Being able to communicate in-person with anyone, in their native language and dialect is just the beginning for Vocre. Soon, we will add new features that will allow you to make a phone call or have a quick chat with anyone, anywhere. 

Vocre gives people the ability to talk to anyone in any language. Our world is full of people worth talking to. Now, nothing is holding you back. 

Supported Languages/Countries:
• Arabic - Egypt
• Arabic - Saudi Arabia
• Arabic - United Arab Emirates
• Catalan - Spain
• Chinese Cantonese - Hong Kong
• Chinese Mandarin - China
• Chinese Mandarin - Taiwan
• Croatian - Croatia (no voice output)
• Czech - Czech Republic
• Danish - Denmark
• Dutch - Netherlands
• English – Australia
• English – India
• English – United Kingdom
• English – United States
• Finnish - Finland
• French – Canada
• French – France
• German - Germany
• Greek - Greece
• Hebrew - Israel
• Hindi - India
• Hungarian - Hungary
• Indonesian - Indonesia
• Italian - Italy
• Japanese - Japan
• Korean - Korea
• Malay - Malaysia (no voice output)
• Norwegian Nynorsk - Norway
• Polish - Poland
• Portuguese - Brazil
• Portuguese - Portugal
• Romanian - Romania
• Russian - Russia
• Slovak - Slovakia
• Spanish – Mexico
• Spanish – Spain
• Spanish – United States
• Swedish - Sweden
• Thai - Thailand
• Turkish - Turkey
• Ukrainian - Ukraine (no voice output)
• Vietnamese - Vietnam (no voice output)

Speech Recognition powered by Nuance.
Text-to-Speech voices powered by iSpeech.

*Vocre is in active development and we value our users' feedback to help us improve Vocre. Contact us in-app via email and let us know your thoughts.

Oh, and if you're having any trouble pronouncing 'Vocre,' it rhymes with 'hooray' -- not 'mediocre.' ;)

* Vocre requires an Internet connection (3G, 4G, or WiFi) in order to perform translations.
releaseNotes:
Changes:
- Fixed bug that prevented international keyboards from loading on iPad
- Fixed bug that caused Arabic characters to display when user selects Chinese (Taiwan) or Cantonese
- Added new languages: Hindi, Hebrew
- Much improved speech recognition accuracy!
- Added heart button to help improve customer support!

If you like Vocre, would you mind taking a moment to write a nice review on the App Store? We'd greatly appreciate it. Just tap the heart button inside the app. Thanks for using Vocre!

If you're have any questions or concerns, please contact our support team at support@mylanguage.me
